children.text: The following event was uploaded as one of the main AV items to undergo analysis in this project. The event has annotations and will be used later as a clip for comparative analysis to the other events.

The "Monster Mash" by Bobby "Boris" Pickett and the Crypt-Kickers (1962) was performed live on the American Bandstand show in 1964. The novelty Halloween song, "Monster Mash”, is arguably one of the main catalysts for the genre of American Halloween music. The performance of the song was inspired by dance fads like the “Mashed Potato”, continuing the legacy of party dance crazes.
